text: United Nations Security Council Resolution 124 was adopted on March 7, 1957. After examining the application of Ghana for membership of the United Nations, the Council unanimously recommended to the General Assembly that Ghana be admitted. Resolution 124 was adopted unanimously by all 11 members of the Council. ==See also== *List of United Nations Security Council Resolutions 101 to 200 (1953–1965) == References == *Text of the Resolution at undocs.org ==External links== * 0124 0124 Category:History of Ghana Category:Foreign relations of Ghana Category:1957 in Ghana 0124 Category:March 1957 events
title: United Nations Security Council Resolution 124
